TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ValidationErrorEventArgs extends System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs

Docs.summary: Provides information for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error?displayProperty=fullName> attached event.
Gets a value that indicates whether the error is a new error or an existing error that has now been cleared.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationErrorEventAction"> value that indicates whether the error is a new error or an existing error that has now been cleared.

Docs.summary: Gets the error that caused this <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error?displayProperty=fullName> event.
Docs.value: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"> object that caused this <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error?displayProperty=fullName> event.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void InvokeEventHandler (Delegate genericHandler, object genericTarget);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void InvokeEventHandler(class System.Delegate genericHandler, object genericTarget) cil managed

Docs.param: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.
The object to invoke the handler on.
Docs.summary: Invokes the specified handler in a type-specific way on the specified object.
